message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product. It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Can you consider meeting me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to consider the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a bit closer to my desired price. How about we try $7500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $6800? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my means.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my desired price. How about we try $7200?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $6900? I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay within my means.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we try $7100?
I'm really close to accepting, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $6800 again? I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but I need to stay within my means.
